message:
Here is my speech at the programme to mark the centenary celebrations of Bharat Sevashram Sangha. Centenary celebrations of BSS is a perfect time to recall the life of Swami Pranavananda & his outstanding contribution to society. 

Inspired by the ideals of Swami Pranavananda, BSS has been a wonderful combination of Seva & Shram. It has positively impacted many lives. http://nm-4.com/yyt4
